title: Serif face similar to Copperplate Gothic
content:
Hi, I need a little help locating this typeface that I know I have seen and used before. It's similar to Copperplate Gothic but a font search at all the usual locations on the web have yielded nothing. Any help would be appreciated. Thank you in advance.

R

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-11%20at%2011_3761.29.35%20AM.png)
author: ronniemesa

comments.content:
Fire Service equipment was traditionally hand lettered to a common pattern for the jurisdiction.  
As for digital fonts, my choice for a digital substitute would be Nick Shinn's Beaufort Heavy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BeaufortHeavyAsHARDEECOUNTY_4616.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/")  
Don

A runner up, Flange BQ

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FlangeBQAsHARDEECOUNTY_5174.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/")  
Don

I know that's not it but I like the well-named [Fire Ladder](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/the-printers/fire-ladder).  
Adding now the usual suspects for this kind of job: [Modesto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/modesto), [Newtext](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/newtext), [Flower](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/flower-sh), [Silverado](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/silverado-rr), [Biondi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Biondi), [Snag](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/smith-hands/snag)
Modesto and Heinsler are also in the ballpark, but with with smaller serifs than the sample.
